query: query GetProviderTypesAndSpecialties { medical_provider_typesCollection(orderBy: {provider_type_name: AscNullsLast}) { edges { node { id provider_type_code provider_type_name description required_qualifications scope_of_practice license_requirements is_active } } } specialtiesCollection(filter: {is_active: {eq: true}}, orderBy: {specialty_name: AscNullsLast}) { edges { node { id specialty_code specialty_name description display_order } } } }
